tool.name: SAGA.ta_channels.6
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False output_data_STRAHLER $output_data_STRAHLER name SAGA.ta_channels.6 DEM $DEM prefer $prefer response $response outputType_STRAHLER $OutputSection_STRAHLER.outputType_STRAHLER transmissionMode_STRAHLER $OutputSection_STRAHLER.transmissionMode_STRAHLER

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: The input elevation data set. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_STRAHLER
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_STRAHLER
param.label: Strahler Order
param.help: The output data set with encoded Strahler stream order.

tool.help: This tool allows one to calculate the Strahler stream order on basis of a DEM and the steepest descent (D8) algorithm.<br/>
